CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `plm_list` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `key` varchar(250) NOT NULL, `provider` varchar(500) NOT NULL, `description` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `created_on` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `key_UNIQUE` (`key`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
CREATE TABLE `plm_list_item` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `list_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `key` varchar(50) NOT NULL, `primary_order` int(11) NOT NULL, `secondary_order` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `tertiary_order` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `creator` int(11) NOT NULL, `date_created` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `key_UNIQUE` (`key`), KEY `plm_item_list` (`list_id`), KEY `plm_item_order` (`list_id`,`primary_order`,`secondary_order`,`tertiary_order`), KEY `plm_item_user` (`creator`), CONSTRAINT `plm_item_user` FOREIGN KEY (`creator`) REFERENCES `openmrs`.`users` (`user_id`) ON DELETE NO ACTION ON UPDATE CASCADE, CONSTRAINT `plm_item_list` FOREIGN KEY (`list_id`) REFERENCES `plm_lists` (`id`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE=InnoDB;
